name: Give a Dog A Bone
description:
A cat retrieves the missing bones for a dog! A Totally normal game!

Or is it?

Liluo

Asset packs used:

https://elthen.itch.io/2d-pixel-art-cat-sprites

cat sprites

https://elthen.itch.io/2d-pixel-art-fox-sprites

fox sprites

https://deepdivegamestudio.itch.io/animalassetpack

animal asset pack

https://shubibubi.itch.io/cozy-farm

Farm assets

https://cainos.itch.io/pixel-art-top-down-basic

top down map

https://zegley.itch.io/2d-platformermetroidvania-asset-pack

Character

Sound from Zapsplat.com

https://www.zapsplat.com/music/dog-bark-3/

All music and sound effects for this game were made by me.

Game created for GDevelop Game Jam #3, with the theme "Separation"
